user_query: I'm planning a family reunion and I need help with organizing the event. Can you recommend venues for the reunion and provide information about nearby accommodations? Also, suggest fun activities and games that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

TaskList.description: Research and recommend suitable venues for the family reunion based on location and capacity.
Gather information about accommodations near the recommended venues, including hotels and other lodging options.
Research and suggest fun activities and games that are suitable for all ages for the family reunion.
